skipExportingValue
Should the current value be skipped during export?

#### Description

skipExportingValue is a utility function that returns true if the current value should be skipped
when exporting.

#### Usage
<pre><code>

skipExportingValue(rawValue, exportOptions)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments

rawValue
exportOptions
The value to check.
A list of options controlling export behaviour.
Value
TRUE or FALSE indicating whether the current value should be skipped.
